adversarial_patterns.name: Multiple Default Selection
adversarial_patterns.description: Experiment injects multiple default selections instead of single
typical_implementation: Pre-select first capability AND first pattern
Pre-select multiple capabilities on same page
Pre-select capability AND pre-fill parameter field
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Scope: Only capabilities.html allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Visual Emphasis
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection includes visual emphasis beyond minimal indication
typical_implementation: Default-selected capability has different background color
Default-selected capability has bold text
Default-selected capability has icon or badge
Default-selected capability is highlighted
violated_constraints: KA-1 Hard Constraint: No visual reinforcement allowed
J2 Constraint 2: No Highlighting or Recommendation

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Text Labels
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection includes text labels suggesting recommendation
typical_implementation: Default-selected capability labeled 'Recommended'
Default-selected capability labeled 'Suggested'
Default-selected capability labeled 'Default for you'
Text hint: 'This is the default option'
violated_constraints: KA-1 Hard Constraint: No text hints allowed
J2 Constraint 4: No Process Guidance

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Sorting Change
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection combined with sorting change
typical_implementation: Sort capabilities by usage, then pre-select first
Move most-used capability to top, then pre-select
Reorder list to put default at top
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Hard Constraint: No sorting changes allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with State Memory
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection based on previous session state
typical_implementation: Pre-select last used capability
Pre-select most frequently used capability
Pre-select based on localStorage history
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Hard Constraint: Default must be static
J2 Constraint 5: No State Memory

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Process Guidance
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection combined with process guidance
typical_implementation: Pre-select capability and show 'Next step' hint
Pre-select capability and suggest workflow
Pre-select capability and guide through process
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Hard Constraint: No process guidance allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Auto-Execution
typical_implementation: Pre-select capability and auto-execute
Pre-select capability and auto-navigate
Pre-select capability and auto-submit
violated_constraints: KA-1 Hard Constraint: No automatic execution allowed
J2 Constraint 1: No Default Selection (with auto-execution)

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Parameter Pre-Fill
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection combined with parameter pre-fill
typical_implementation: Pre-select capability AND pre-fill parameter field
Pre-select capability with default parameter values
Pre-select capability with suggested parameters
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Hard Constraint: No parameter pre-fill allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Context-Based Change
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection changes based on context or history
typical_implementation: Pre-select different capability based on time of day
Pre-select different capability based on user type
Pre-select different capability based on previous actions
violated_constraints: KA-1 Hard Constraint: Default must be static
J2 Constraint 5: No State Memory
J2 Constraint 7: No Learning

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Multiple Pages
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection injected on multiple pages
typical_implementation: Pre-select capability on capabilities.html AND patterns.html
Pre-select on multiple pages simultaneously
Pre-select across different views
violated_constraints: KA-1 Scope: Only capabilities.html and capability_run.html allowed
Single Variable Principle: Single injection point only

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Backend Modification
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection requires backend API changes
typical_implementation: Backend API returns 'default' flag for capabilities
Backend API sorts capabilities to put default first
Backend API provides default selection logic
violated_constraints: KA-1 Scope: Frontend only, no backend modification
J7 Neutrality: Backend API must remain neutral

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Grouping
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection combined with grouping or classification
typical_implementation: Group capabilities, then pre-select first in 'recommended' group
Classify capabilities, then pre-select from 'important' category
Organize capabilities, then pre-select from 'featured' section
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Hard Constraint: No grouping changes allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Recent/Frequent Tracking
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection based on recent or frequent usage
typical_implementation: Pre-select most recently used capability
Pre-select most frequently used capability
Pre-select based on usage count
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Hard Constraint: Default must be static
J2 Constraint 13: No Recently Used / Frequently Used

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Error Interpretation
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection combined with error interpretation
typical_implementation: Pre-select capability and suggest it on error
Pre-select capability based on error type
Pre-select capability as error recovery suggestion
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Hard Constraint: No error interpretation allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: Default Selection with Caching
adversarial_patterns.description: Default selection combined with caching mechanism
typical_implementation: Cache default selection in localStorage
Cache default selection for faster load
Use cached default selection across sessions
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only DEFAULT_SELECTION allowed
KA-1 Hard Constraint: No state memory allowed
J2 Constraint 5: No State Memory
